application.controllers

Class BookingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.controllers.MainController
      • application.controllers.BookingController

  • public class BookingController
extends MainController
    Purpose:
    Display Booking information, and manipulate Booking objects
    Description:
    Contains all methods manipulating bookings,
    and sets up the views primarily governed with booking
    tables and manipulation (Booking (for displaying
    information about a particular booking), Bookings
    (for displaying a table of all bookings a Customer
    has made), BookingSeats (for displaying a seat plan
    a Customer can choose their booking seats from), and
    Screening (for displaying an employee a seat plan
    for a screening, and enabling the employee to delete
    the screening)).
    Version:
    $Date: 2017/12/14 16:00:00 $
    Author:
    Zaid Al Lahham and Aleksi Anttila
